item.title: Flooded road during the heavy rain on 20/09/24, 22nd September
item.description:
The whole of Wheatland Drive flooded during the heavy rain on 20th September 2024. I live at number 30 and the water came half way up my drive. The drains did not seem to cope at all with it and it was very worrying.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Wheatland Drive, Springbank, Cheltenham

item.title: Numerous Street lights out along the path making it pitch black., 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowthorpe Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inadequate management of rainwater flowing down Pos Office Lane, 22nd September
item.description:
During heavy rainfall, water flowing down Post Office Lane diverts into the trackway at the north of Inglecroft and thence downhill into the territory of the Manse, flooding the garden, threatening to collapse retaining walls and entering the house via airbricks. This is an old issue, first reported many years ago. The council's solution of putting in a gulley at the top of the lane to reduce water flowing down the lane is demonstrably not working, particularly as the drains in the area are defective and constantly allowed to silt up. In addition, the kerbing on PO Lane, as has been frequently pointed out, is inadequate, being a mere 1" proud in places, and in any case bypasses the nearest drain by 4-6".
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Post Office Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road washed away., 22nd September
item.description:
Road washed away at bottom of hill again. Half the road is missing and has been destroyed. Needs completely resurfacing ASAP. This is a ongoing problem and the slap and pat fixes are not working and cost more in the long run. A full engineered solution is needed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
